name: Pop Rox
description: Pop Rox is an indica-dominant hybrid strain from a private seed collection in Las Vegas. True to its name, Pop Rox carries a sweet, candy-like aroma that translates to a fruity flavor on the inhale. Relaxing, euphoric effects give rise to creative clarity while stress and bad moods melt away.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Euphoric, Aroused, Tingly, Creative, Eye Pressure, Fatigue, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Muscle Spasms, Dry Eyes
